about_the_game:
Are You Ready For The Ultimate Rhythm Boxing Showdown!?



Custom Songs Support, World Bosses, Cross-platform Leaderboards, Power-ups, Arcade Mode, EPIC Gloves, Pet Dragons, Free Levels, and constant updates await you in BOX to the BEAT!



Immersive environment


Step into the ring and experience the ultimate boxing workout! Box To The Beat VR features reactive environments and complete immersion.


Unique Environments And 30+ Levels At Launch


Immerse yourself in the 30 plus levels and explore tons of unique environments at launch. Each level offers a new challenge and a chance to test your skills.


Pick Your Style


The game contains a vast collection of stunning boxing gloves for players to unlock and choose from. Show off your unique flair and dominate the ring with gloves that match your skill and attitude.


Unique Progress Tracking


Introducing our newest feature - the baby dragon! Play the game, burn calories and watch as your dragon grows! The calories you burn in the game are converted into food for your dragon, which represents your progress. Train hard and watch your dragon thrive as you level up together!


Supporting The Music Community


We are committed to supporting the music community by signing up talented artists for DLCs. Our goal is to create a platform for artists to showcase their music in an interactive and engaging way. With our commitment to delivering high-quality DLCs, we aim to bring new and exciting music to our players and provide an opportunity for artists to reach a wider audience.
detailed_description:
Join our Discord!

Join our Discord to compare your scores to other community members, share tips, and stay even more up to date with community news.


NYX 2023 Award Winner!


About the Game

Are You Ready For The Ultimate Rhythm Boxing Showdown!?



Custom Songs Support, World Bosses, Cross-platform Leaderboards, Power-ups, Arcade Mode, EPIC Gloves, Pet Dragons, Free Levels, and constant updates await you in BOX to the BEAT!



Immersive environment


Step into the ring and experience the ultimate boxing workout! Box To The Beat VR features reactive environments and complete immersion.


Unique Environments And 30+ Levels At Launch


Immerse yourself in the 30 plus levels and explore tons of unique environments at launch. Each level offers a new challenge and a chance to test your skills.


Pick Your Style


The game contains a vast collection of stunning boxing gloves for players to unlock and choose from. Show off your unique flair and dominate the ring with gloves that match your skill and attitude.


Unique Progress Tracking


Introducing our newest feature - the baby dragon! Play the game, burn calories and watch as your dragon grows! The calories you burn in the game are converted into food for your dragon, which represents your progress. Train hard and watch your dragon thrive as you level up together!


Supporting The Music Community


We are committed to supporting the music community by signing up talented artists for DLCs. Our goal is to create a platform for artists to showcase their music in an interactive and engaging way. With our commitment to delivering high-quality DLCs, we aim to bring new and exciting music to our players and provide an opportunity for artists to reach a wider audience.

name: Box To The Beat VR

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Box To The Beat VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • VR Support: Supports all major VR headsets
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 4790K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Enjoy constant updates and free songs, custom gloves and cosmetics, multiple game modes, compete on leaderboards, and join worldwide world bosses! Proudly developed and self-published by our indie studio.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
